Calcul of the percentage of suppression

For each Teff/Treg ratio, the percentage of suppression was calculated with the following formula: \[Log2\(y) of \(Teff cells alone) - Log2\(y) of \(Teff + Treg cells]) / Log2\(y) of \(Teff cells alone)
The y value corresponds to the mean fluorescent intensity of CFSE of the whole Teff cell population divided by the mean fluorescent intensity of CFSE of undivided Teff cells.
